TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {24699=A high-performance jacket for tough winter road riding. Originally launched in 2004 – and part of the Rapha range ever since – today it is acknowledged as the world’s finest road riding jacket. Conceived as an all-day outer shell that was windproof, highly breathable (and didn’t involve fluorescent Lycra), the jacket has won numerous plaudits and the latest incarnation includes improved cuff bindings. Versatile enough to be worn in all but the warmest conditions, if you’re looking for the one Rapha product to start restocking your riding wardrobe, this is it.}
textBeforeTable: Availability – Cyclist “A softshell is a must for every rider’s wardrobe." – The Independent (London) “[Proof that] bike gear needn’t commit crimes against fashion.” – The Daily Telegraph (London) It is the cut that sets it apart… no wonder it looks more at home on the pages of GQ than Cycling Monthly. – The Independent (London) “[Proof that] bike gear needn’t commit crimes against fashion.” Reviews Bite grip Offset zip for comfortable layering over jerseys Drop down rear storm flap with saddle grip Zipped underarm vents to help regulate body temperature Reinforced shoulder pad Three large rear pockets keep loads stable Side-panel construction for superior fit 100% windproof Highly breathable Water-resistant membrane Key features A high-performance jacket for tough winter road riding. Originally launched in 2004 – and part of the Rapha range ever since – today it is acknowledged as the world’s finest road riding jacket. Conceived as an all-day outer shell that was windproof, highly breathable (and didn’t involve fluorescent Lycra), the jacket has won numerous plaudits and the latest incarnation includes improved cuff bindings. Versatile enough to be worn in all but the warmest conditions, if you’re looking for the one Rapha product to start restocking your riding wardrobe, this is it. Test ride any
textAfterTable: Sizing CM IN XS S M L XL XXL Neck < 31 31-36 36-41 41-46 46-51 51+ Chest < 84 84-91 91-99 99-107 107-115 115+ Back length 50-56 56-62 62-68 68-74 74-80 80+ Arm length < 60 60-62 62-64 64-66 66-68 68+ XS S M L XL XXL Neck < 12 12-14 14-16 16-18 18-20 20+ Chest < 33 33-36 36-39 39-42 42-45 45+ Back length 20-22 22-24 24-27 27-29 29-31 31+ Arm length < 24 24- 24.5 24.5- 25 25- 26 26- 26.5 26.5+ Sizing Guide NECK: measure the circumference around the base of the neck. CHEST: measure underneath the armpits with the tape measure straight around. BACK LENGTH: measure from the bottom of where your collar sits/base of the neck to the bottom of your spine. ARM LENGTH: measure from where the seam would start at shoulder to bottom of the wrist. Features & Care
